userPrompt: Help me start a podcast about computer science
agentReply: Breaking down the user prompt into UI blocks

items.name: Microphone
items.recommended: Consider investing in a USB condenser microphone for better sound quality

items.name: Editing Software
items.purpose: To edit and enhance audio recordings
items.recommended: Audacity or Adobe Audition are popular choices

items.name: Hosting Platform
items.purpose: To host and distribute podcast episodes
items.recommended: Platforms like Podbean, Anchor, or Buzzsprout
